recipe.name: Pizza Sauce
recipe.ingredients:
Makes about 1 quart
120 grams onion (1 medium onion), peeled and quartered 3 cloves garlic, peeled 1 teaspoons fennel powder Pinch red pepper flakes (optional) 1/2 teaspoon dry oregano 1/2 teaspoon dry basil 1 teaspoon salt 2 tablespoons olive oil 2 15-ounce (425 grams) tomato sauce 2 teaspoons sugar

step.describe: Scrap down bowl and lid. Add fennel, red pepper flakes (optional), oregano, basil, and salt.
Scrape down bowl and lid.Add olive oil.
For a smoother sauce, finish by blending 10-15 seconds

Transfer the sauce to a storage container and allow it to come to room temperature before refrigerating. Itâ€™s best to add the sauce to the unbaked pizza dough while it is cold, otherwise the dough can soften too much to allow it to be moved to a pizza stone.
This sauce can also be used on pasta, or in calzones, or on vegetables.
